message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It benefits us both to decide quickly before inflation eats into our potential gains.
I'm willing to take a bit more, considering the inflation affects you more. Let's settle on 55/45.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it evenly before we both lose even more to inflation. 50/50 is the only fair outcome.
